attributes.additional_details:
With reference to her comment : "These are anti-capitalist protesters but we have seen photos of them drinking their Starbucks coffee and using their Mac computers."

Never have a heard such anti-democratic views from a member of the cabinet who represents law/order in our home country.  This MP obviously has a very distorted view of our democratic system and as a result most certainly should NOT be Home Secretary - A post which first and foremost MUST defend our democratic rights!
